Need to reschedule? No worries! Life happens, and we're here to make it easy. Just let us know when works best for you, and we'll find a new time that fits perfectly. Your health is our priority!

title: Disclaimer
description:
Self-screening is intended for monitoring and tracking your health, not for diagnosing medical conditions.


Users can input their daily measurement readings into the app, which then generates charts and graphs to help monitor their health based on the data provided. Please note that the app does not measure the readings itself but only records and tracks the user-entered data.

The app currently draws information from reputable sources such as the CDC and WHO. However, please be aware that the data provided may not always reflect real-life situations accurately.

The app is intended for informational purposes only and is not a medical device. Users experiencing health issues should consult with doctors or healthcare professionals for appropriate advice and treatment.

title: Some other facts of blood pressure
description:
Need your meds delivered? Request a drug drop  with just a click and have your prescriptions conveniently brought to your door!

 **Importance:** 
- **Convenience:** Save time and effort by bringing medications directly to your door.
- **Adherence:** By ensuring that you receive medications on time, dawa drop feature help improve adherence to prescribed treatment plans and reduce missed doses.
- **Accessibility:** We provide access to medications for individuals with mobility issues, those living in remote areas, or those who lack transportation.
- **Privacy:** Dawa Drop offers a discreet way to receive prescriptions, which can be important for individuals who prefer to keep their health conditions and medications private.

 **How to Access:**
- Go to Dawa Drop module under apps
- Select Request for Drug Delivery
- Select Refill appointment drug
- Fill the drug request form and submit.
- Your will receive notification on the progress of your request till delivery.
Overall, drug delivery drops enhance the convenience, safety, and accessibility of medications, improving overall patient care and satisfaction!
